banner: Hello! I'm an engineering student at the Pennsylvania State University who has sacrificed countless hours of sleep to bring you this website. Thank you for your visit today––I hope you have a great time exploring.
about: Based in Tennessee and studying in State College, I have extensive knowledge in full-stack development and software automation test engineering. Aside from my unhealthy addiction with everything food––whether it be eating or cooking, in my free time I enjoy being an amateur musician and dedicated gym rat.
